thread.title: Road dogs: 11 pooches behind the wheel
thread.title_full: Road dogs: 11 pooches behind the wheel - Telegraph

author: Ali Gray
title: Road dogs: 11 pooches behind the wheel
text: What’s the legal driving age in dog years? Who’s pressing the accelerator? And how do these pups afford skyrocketing petrol costs? Sure, dogs behind the wheel raise some questions. But one thing is certain: they look cuter than you ever will on the motorway. Now if only we knew what they were thinking as they cruise along… “If you kids don’t quieten down, I will turn this car around. You can forget about Legoland!” Photo: Getty “It’s not the size of the dog in the fight… it’s the size of his steering wheel.” Photo: Alamy “Finally, my Thelma and Louise moment has arrived.” Photo: Shutterstock “Don’t be fooled by these rainbow sunglasses. I will run you over.” Photo: Rex Features “Whose daft idea was it to take tequila shots on a Tuesday night?” Photo: Getty “You’re changing your shoes again? I’m going to blare this horn for another 30 seconds and then I’m leaving without you.” Photo: Gallery Stock “I’m starting the farm-to-dog-bowl movement.” Photo: Getty “No pictures, please. I’m concentrating on the road.” Photo: Alamy “Hello, ladies. Need a ride?” Photo: Shutterstock “Could somebody fetch me a booster seat?” Photo: Shutterstock “My other car is a Porsche.” Photo: Shutterstock Spend more time laughing and less time worrying behind the wheel. With the AA on your side, you're covered when the unpredictable happens. Find out more at theaa.com
